MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL14 postcode area of Rhos, Wrexham, affecting properties in Windsor Road, Duke Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  09:19AM. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midday today. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:14AM on 26th January 2021
